name: github-darktheme-chromeextension
description: Github dark theme deployed via chrome extension

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.prod.js && ncp manifest.json dist/manifest.json --clobber true && ncp src/extension-icons/ dist/ --clobber true && ncp src/html/popup.html dist/popup.html --clobber true
scripts.dev: webpack --config webpack.dev.js && ncp manifest.json dist/manifest.json --clobber true && ncp src/extension-icons/ dist/ --clobber true && ncp src/html/popup.html dist/popup.html --clobber true
scripts.watch: webpack -w --config webpack.dev.js && ncp manifest.json dist/manifest.json --clobber true && ncp src/extension-icons/ dist/ --clobber true && ncp src/html/popup.html dist/popup.html --clobber true

author: Aaron Cooper
